EmailTemplate.subject: Fulfillment Reminder: Monday, May 30
EmailTemplate.textOnly: May 12, 2022 Monday, May 30, 2022 is Memorial Day, a US National holiday and observed by NCR and our logistics provider. It is not considered a “business day.” Orders with a Service Level of Next Business Day (NBD) will be fulfilled as shown below. Orders with a Service Level of Next Calendar Day (NCD) will not be affected by the holiday. They will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following day. Next Flight Out (NFO) service will also be available every day, including Monday, May 30.
